law.catch_line: Skilled nursing services provided to Medicaid recipients by adult day health care programs.
law.text: An adult day health care program shall be required to provide skilled nursing services to Medicaid recipients only during the posted hours of operation.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch.277, sec.1, effective July 15, 2002; and ch. 295, sec. 2, effective April 9, 2002.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2002). This statute was created by 2002 Ky. Acts chs.277 and 295 with identical language. The two sections have been codified together.
